name: Ball Game (itch) (The Beanster)
description:
This game is a simple but challenging game made with simple shapes, but with fun gameplay strewn across 25 unique levels. 

it takes about 1 hour to beat the game if your good enough, but if you want to make it more challenging you can enable hard mode, which adds more obstacles in your path.

 along with hard mode is 2 other modes called 2x mode and Beans mode. 2x mode lets you play the game at 2x speed. Beans mode does... something... you'll just have to find out by playing this game.

The music is also pretty good, which you can find here https://www.youtube.com/@thebeanmaster
